about_the_game:
Note: The current images are from the alpha version, the style will be modified in later versions.

Welcome to the kingdom of Nafiljar, in this game of creation of potions and deductions you will put yourself in the shoes of an alchemist in which the decisions you make will forge the future of the kingdom.

Random: Each game you start is unique so don't worry if things don't end as expected.

Buy and/or grow your own ingredients: The local herbalist will always be happy to provide you with the best ingredients but you will always have the possibility to grow your own herbal ingredients if you are good with plants of course

Create and get gold: You will be able to enjoy seeing how your current account increases with each potion you sell, it will only depend on you if your customers return home satisfied or not.

Forge your destiny: Will you be the most recognized alchemist in the kingdom so that the king himself makes you his royal alchemist or will you prefer to join the brotherhood of thieves? Will you end up in prison for fraud or ruined for your nefarious alchemist skills? Your future as an alchemist will depend only on you, so are you ready?

History: Discover the history of this kingdom and its people fulfilling orders or chatting with the different characters.

Combat: Collect ingredients in dangerous places to fulfill the most special orders.

Deduce: each ingredient has a unique essence in each game, discover them through congresses or the creation of potions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You wanted to be an Alchemist and after several years studying you finally have your own business. Will you be able to stand out and become the real Alchemist? Mix ingredients, sell potions and find out the essences to grow your reputation in this game of deductions where each game is unique.
